DOC.brief_summary: During major surgical procedure , intravascular volume maintain administration isotonic fluid Lactated Ringers ( LR ) , Normal Saline ( NS ) Normosol-R. All three fluid common clinical use purpose . As large volume NS may result dilutional acidosis increase base deficit , may cloud clinical decision make resuscitative effort guide acid-base status routine arterial blood gas analysis . This prospective , randomize study evaluate change acid-base electrolyte ( sodium , potassium , calcium ) status use various isotonic fluid intraoperative resuscitation .
